author: Brian Barrett
title: Russian Hackers Went After San Francisco International Airport
description: Plus: Windows zero days, Covid-19 spam, and more of the week's top security news.
content: The argument overApple and Google's plan to use Bluetooth to help with Covid-19 contact tracing escalated this week. But while plenty of societal and efficacy issues remain unresolved, we found answers to some of the tricker questions about the underlying tec… [+3773 chars]
